name: apple-notes
description: Fast Apple Notes CLI tools exposed as MCP

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note in Apple Notes with HTML formatting

folder.description: The folder to create the note in (default: Notes)

content.description: HTML content for the note body

tools.name: read_note
tools.description: Read a note's contents by searching for its title

search.description: Search term to find the note by name

tools.name: list_notes
tools.description: List recent notes or notes in a specific folder

folder.description: Optional folder name to filter by

limit.description: Maximum number of notes to return (default: 10)

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search for notes by name or content
